name: ROBBIE P - OFF THE FLOOR NFT ALBUM

metadata.name: OFF THE FLOOR | NFT ALBUM
metadata.description:
This NFT Audio Album is part of a 2 Tiered Genesis Drop.

OFF THE FLOOR shares stories of substance abuse & addiction, the reclamation of identity, healing from past trauma, mental health and dedication to building a better future.

This NFT contains the following unlockable content:  
x10 Audio Tracks  
x10 Acapellas  
Total Track Files: 20

Utilities:  
1. Holders of this NFT are granted a Limited Non-Exclusive IP Licence to utilise the Acapellas & Instrumentals in the creation of a new recording.  
2. Holders of this NFT receive exclusive airdrops & can claim a free mint in future drops that exceed 100 NFTâ€™s within a collection.  
3. Future music releases will appear within unlockable content before they are officially released on streaming platforms.

Tracklist:  
1. HOW'D YOU GO 2  
2. FOMO  
3. MAMA SAID  
4. PSA  
5. PRAY 4 ME  
6. REHAB  
7. AMBIVALENCE  
8. INVINCIBLE  
9. FULLY LOADED  
10. TRIGGER 

The MP4 video is a snippet reel of all songs available as part of this NFT.

More information at the official website https://robbiep808.xyz
